## arrayEachAsync() function

异步遍历数组，返回 false 中断遍历

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare function arrayEachAsync<V>(
  array: ArrayLike<V>,
  iterator: (val: V, idx: number) => Promise<any> | any,
  reverse?: boolean
): Promise<void>;
```

## Parameters

| Parameter | Type                                                  | Description               |
| --------- | ----------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------- |
| array     | ArrayLike&lt;V&gt;                                    | 数组                      |
| iterator  | (val: V, idx: number) =&gt; Promise&lt;any&gt; \| any | 支持Promise类型的回调函数 |
| reverse   | boolean                                               | _(Optional)_ 是否反向遍历 |

**Returns:**

Promise&lt;void&gt;
